B

BuildingInfo - Class in pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.logic
BuildingInfo is class that stores trees of Location objects and allows storing and accessing them during current BuildingInfoApplication runtime.
BuildingInfo() - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.logic.BuildingInfo
Constructs a new BuildingInfo with no trees of locations.

C

calculateHeating(int) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.rest.BuildingInfoController
Returns JSON response representing id, name and average heating energy of location with matching id
calculateHeatingEnergy() - Method in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.Location
Calculates average heating energy of location by dividing heating energy of location by its cubature.
calculateLighting(int) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.rest.BuildingInfoController
Returns JSON response representing id, name and average lighting power of location with matching id
calculateLightingPower() - Method in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.Location
Calculates average lighting power of location by dividing lighting power of location by its area.
CompoundLocation - Class in pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model
CompoundLocation is a location that can store other objects that inherit Location as children in a tree.
CompoundLocation() - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.CompoundLocation
Constructs CompoundLocation with autogenerated unique id, empty string as the name and no children.
CompoundLocation(String) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.CompoundLocation
Constructs CompoundLocation with autogenerated unique id, specified name and no children.
CompoundLocation(String, List<Location>) - Constructor for class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.CompoundLocation
Constructs CompoundLocation with autogenerated unique id, specified name and specified children.
counter - Static variable in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model.Location
used for generating unique identifiers of locations in app
createBuilding(ObjectNode) - Method in class pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.rest.BuildingInfoController
Deserializes JSON to building, saves it in BuildingInfoController.buildingInfo and returns JSON response with re-serialized building.

L

Location - Class in pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model
Location is abstract base class for all locations that should be represented as a tree.

LocationView.All - Interface in pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.other

R

Room - Class in pl.put.poznan.BuildingInfo.model
Room is a location that represents leaf in a tree of Location objects.
